entry_points.name: walks_amount
entry_points.description: Returns the amount of walks the dog has taken.

entry_points.name: walks_total_length
entry_points.description: Returns the total length of the dog's walks.

entry_points.name: walk_the_dog
entry_points.description: Adds a walk to the dog's walks.
